usage_per_sheet(self) -%3E int:%0A        if self.hardness == %22HB%22 :%0A            return 1%0A        elif self.hardness == %222B%22 :%0A            return 2%0A        elif self.hardness == %224B%22 :%0A            return 4%0A        elif self.hardness == %226B%22 :%0A            return 6%0A        return 0%0A    %0A    def get_size(self) -%3E int:%0A        return self.size%0A    def size%0A    %0A    def __str__(self):%0A        return f%22%7Bself.thickness%7D:%7Bself.hardness%7D:%7Bself.size%7D%22%0A    %0Aclass Pencil:%0A    def __init__(self, thickness: float):%0A        self.thickness = thickness%0A        self.tip: Lead %7C None = None%0A        self.barrel: list%5BLead%5D = %5B%5D%0A%0A    def insert(self, lead: Lead) -%3E bool:%0A        if lead.get_thickness() != %7C None:%0A        if self.tip is None:%0A            print(%22fail: sem grafite no bico%22)%0A            return None%0A        removed = self.tip%0A        self.tip = None%0A        return self.barrel:%0A            print(%22fail:sem grafite no tambor%22)%0A            return False%0A        self.tip = self.barrel.pop(0)%0A        return True%0A    %0A    def write_page(self):%0A        if self.tip is None:%0A            print(%22fail: sem grafite no bico%22)%0A            return%0A        if self.tip.get_size() %3C= 10:%0A            print(%22fail: grfite acabou%22)%0A            self.tip = None%0A            return%0A        %0A        usage = self.tip.usage_per_sheet()%0A        if self.tip.get_size() - usage %3C 10:%0A            print(%22fail: folha incompleta%22)%0A            self.tip.set_size(10)%0A            return%0A        %0A        self.tip.set_size(self.tip.get_size() - usage)%0A%0Adef __str__(self):%0A    tip_str = str(self.tip) if self.tip else %22null%22%0A    barrel_str = %22, %22.join(str(lead) for lead in self.barrel)%0A    return f%22Bico: %7Btip_str%7D%5CnTambor: %5B%7Bbarrel_str%7D%5D%22%0A
